task.prompt: Karl, Ryan, and Ben are fond of collecting stickers. Karl has 25 stickers. Ryan has 20 more stickers than Karl. Ben has 10 fewer stickers than Ryan. They placed all their stickers in one sticker book. How many stickers did they place altogether?

steps.c: Plan: identify requirements from task. Task: Karl, Ryan, and Ben are fond of collecting stickers. Karl has 25 stickers. Ryan has 20 more stickers than Karl. Ben has 10 fewer stickers than Ryan. They placed all their stickers in one sticker book. How many stickers did they place altogether?
Work through the math carefully and keep intermediate values.
